text: Ware wa mata,`watashi-tachi wa, kirisutokyōtodesu.' To iu mono tomo yakusoku o musunda. Daga kare-ra mo sadzuke rareta kyōkun no ichibubun o wasurete shimatta. Sorede are wa fukkatsu no hi made, tekii to zōo no nen to o kare-ra no ma ni kobiritsuka seta. Arrā wa kare-ra ni, sono okonatta koto o mamonaku atode tsuge shirase rarerudearou
